fit.description: Image fit mode, optional value is fill contain cover none scale-down
fit.description_zh: Image fit mode, optional value is fill contain cover none scale-down

position 3.2.3.description: The position of the replaceable element's content in its content box, equal to object-position
position 3.2.3.description_zh: The position of the replaceable element's content in its content box, equal to object-position

alt.description: Image alt text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag
alt.description_zh: Image alt text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag

title.description: Image title text, the same as with the native attributes of the img tag
title.description_zh: Image title text, the same as with the native attributes of the img tag

referrerpolicy.description: Indicate which referrer to use when fetching the resource. This attribute requires attention to browser compatibility, see MDN
referrerpolicy.description_zh: Indicate which referrer to use when fetching the resource. This attribute requires attention to browser compatibility, see MDN

loading.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in loading
loading.description_zh: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in loading

error.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in error
error.description_zh: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in error

block.description: Whether it is a block element
block.description_zh: Whether it is a block element

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on Image
events.description_zh: Triggered when you click on Image

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the image is successfully loaded (when the image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the image is successfully loaded)
events.description_zh: Triggered when the image is successfully loaded (when the image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the image is successfully loaded)

events.name: error
events.description: Triggered when an image fails to load (when an image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the number of attempts ends)
events.description_zh: Triggered when an image fails to load (when an image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the number of attempts ends)
